dict.acceptation: 瓦片，瓷砖；空心砖；麻将牌；

sent.orig: PRODUCT: Porcelain Polished Tile, Porcelain Glazed Tile, Glass Mosaics, Stone Mosaics, Resin Bathroom Products.
sent.trans: 产品(PRODUCT)：瓷质抛光砖，瓷质釉面砖，玻璃马赛克，石材马赛克，树脂浴室产品。

sent.orig: Ceramic products includes polished tile,glaze tile,etc.
sent.trans: 我司加工销售的陶瓷产品主要有：抛光砖，釉面砖等。

sent.orig: Mucus-roller flower-printing oil use to inner-wall tile and rustic tile.
sent.trans: 胶辊印花的印花载体，主要用于瓷片、水晶砖、仿古砖的滚筒印花载体。

sent.orig: Tile-end of eastern Zhou dynasty is very important in the history of Tile-end of China.
sent.trans: 东周时期的瓦当在中国瓦当史上占有极其重要的地位。

sent.orig: An abundant supply of marble composite tile, composite marble (forest green) , complex marble, marble tile.
sent.trans: 大量提供大理石复合瓷砖，复合大理石（雨林绿），复合大理石，大理石瓷砖。
